TopicTitle: Crash and parts missing on reload.

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

As my title says, the game crashed in the VAB and upon loading the game again all parts are missing and I cannot load craft.

I restarted my PC and loaded up KSP and the parts where back.

Anyone seen this before?

MODS USED

-EVE

-KVV

-EE

-rootpart

-advanced camera

Thanks

MJ
